txt.en: '[placeholder], while you were away, I received a message from Thorin's Hall... asking for you. Dwalin would like to speak with you regarding your recent efforts here in Khazad-dûm. He is quite knowledgeable of old dwarf-runes and will likely be a source of great help to you.\n\n'Thorin's Hall lies far to the west in Ered Luin. You should travel there as soon as possible, for Dwalin is a very important dwarf.'

'Well met, [placeholder]. Aye, I've heard tell of you many a time.

'I myself have some skill in runes. When Thorin's Company had reclaimed the Lonely Mountain, we hid the treasure and safe-guarded it using our own rune-craft.'

Dwalin looks far off, as though recalling some memory long forgotten, then smiles.

'But enough about me; I've asked you here to help out with a matter of some great importance to our efforts to retake Khazad-dûm.'
'You should speak with Dwalin in Thorin's Hall.'
Márus received a summons from Dwalin at Thorin's Hall, requesting your presence.
Talk to Dwalin at Thorin's Hall
Dwalin can be found in Thorin's Hall in Ered Luin, far to the west of Moria.\n\nMárus has instructed you to go to Thorin's Hall and speak with Dwalin.
